TextView.android:text: Certination with range of products in its portfolio caters well to the rising demand for Android based mobile application development. In this course we are using a development and test management product. It is a visual development environment to develop, analyze, simulate, and test applications for the Android platform.

The exponential growth of smart phone usage has created a sudden demand in mobile application development skills in the market. Today, there is handful of platforms (smart phones and tablets) that runs these smart devices. This platform domain is led by Apple iOS, Google Android, Microsoft Windows Phone, Symbian platforms - with Apple and Android, being the front runners. Apple iOS is a propriety platform, on the other hand, Android is an open source platform that requires development skills, in Java. It has right set of components available for open source IDEs like Eclipse.

The students will learn how to develop applications for Android mobile devices The students will be eligible for millions of jobs around the world The students will be able to develop mobile applications with shared database supports The students will be able to develop mobile applications that can smartly communicate with a server applications The students will be able to develop multimedia and location based applications for Android devices Understand the entire Android Apps Development Cycle Learn to think computationally. Design and implement a moderately-complex app with real-world implications.
